function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of germicidal sources in the built environment during the heating period","Impact":"Potential reduction in heat and energy demand","Mitigation":"Optimizing the use of germicidal sources to minimize impact on heat and energy demand","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems with integrated germicidal UV-C sources","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
